altTitles.ja: ダンジョンディフェンス

description.en:
When his total scumbags of parents die, he finds himself with a mysterious inheritance of 500 million yen.

Deciding to do whatever he likes from then on, the boy enters the most challenging online game, “Dungeon Attack,” where he becomes the first to unlock the achievement of defeating all the Demon Lords. However, when he answers a mysterious question that appears after completing the game, he suddenly finds himself sent into the game world.

He had been reincarnated as “Dantalian,” the lowest and weakest Demon Lord, ranked 71st in the game world! With nothing but his memory of defeating the strongest Demon Lord and his eloquence to rely on, he fights to survive in this brutal world – this is a story of comeback and revenge!

altTitles.ja: 本日の卜部さんと

description.en:
Urabe Haruna, 24 years old.
Hobbies: smoking, drinking, cosplay.

Urabe Haruna, a girl whose daily posts on social media are accompanied by 1 word, “Today”, has been turned into a serialized comic! She spends her days messing with, teasing, and toying with her junior, Kinoshita-kun.

altTitles.ja: ギャルくんの恋はきっと

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Đơn Phương Kiên Định Của Chàng Gal

description.en:
You don't know how I feel, so why are you being kind to me?

Yoshi, who is super-cheerful, has a secret after-school date with Fuji, a sober boy who is the complete opposite.
It's supposed to be "practice for Fuji-kun to find a lover", but Yoshi secretly has a crush on Fuji!?
If love is revealed, this relationship will end
But his heart throbs at times when Fuji-kun is too cool!
In fact, whereabouts of the love of the super brave Gal-kun...

A plain handsome guy who doesn't know love x a brave gal-kun who is timid about love.
description.es-la:
¿Por qué eres amable conmigo si no sabes como me siento?
El alegre y fiestero Yoshi tiene citas en secreto después de la escuela con su puro opuesto, el callado Fuji.
"Es práctica para cuando consigas pareja" es la excusa que pone Yoshi, ¿¡¿pero en realidad tiene un amor no correspondido?!?
Si descubre que lo amo, esta relación llegará a su fin, ¡pero a veces Fuji-kun es tan genial que me va a mil el corazón!
¿Qué será del amor de este chico que se esfuerza por verse bonito, pero que en realidad es super valiente?
﻿
La historia BL de un chico calmado guapo que no conoce el amor y un chico bonito que es tímido en el amor pero valiente.

altTitles.ja: 女魔王様はゆうしゃくんを倒せない。

altTitles.en: The Demon Queen Can't Defeat Yuusha-kun.

description.en:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
Produced with the help of and supervised by [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline).
description.pt-br: A Rainha Demônio Abyss está preocupada... ela não é capaz de derrotar o herói, considerado o inimigo mortal dos demônio. Esse herói ainda é um jovem inexperiente — ele deveria ser fácil de derrotar! ... Todavia, o problema é que ele, não conhecendo a verdadeira identidade de Abyss, a considera sua "Mestra" e gosta muito dela...!?

じいさんばあさん若返る

altTitles.ja: Jiisan Baasan Wakagaeru

description.en: This story is about Ine and Shouzou, two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.
description.es:
Shozo e Ine son una pareja de ancianos que dirigen una granja de manzanas en Aomori. Un día se despiertan y descubren que se han transformado en sus yo más jóvenes. El apuesto abuelo y la bella abuela se meten en líos.
Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!
description.ja:
青森でリンゴ農家を営む老夫婦・正蔵とイネ。
ある日目覚めるとふたりは若い頃の姿になっていて！？
イケメンなじいさま＆美人なばあさまが巻き起こす、
お騒がせおしどり夫婦コメディ！
description.es-la:
Shozo e Ine son una pareja de ancianos que dirigen una granja de manzanas en Aomori. Un día se despiertan y descubren que se han transformado en sus yo más jóvenes. El apuesto abuelo y la bella abuela se meten en líos.
Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!
description.pt-br: História sobre Ine e Shouzou, dois aposentados com mais de 80 anos que misteriosamente voltaram aos 20 anos uma noite.

title.en: She Has Become a Distant Existence

altTitles.ja: 遠い存在になった幼馴染
遠い存在となった彼女は…

altTitles.ja-ro: Tooi Sonzai to Natta Kanojo wa…

description.en: Once she was his childhood friend who used to hang out with him all the time. Now she's a nationally recognized idol on television who still hangs out with him all the time. An existence so far away, its in another reality!

altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

description.en:
Federal Informant ‘Baek Yisu’ and a criminal gang’s boss, ‘Baek Dogyeong’ are twin brothers.

With the same faces the two twin brothers have lived different lives until now. Yisu, who’s been betrayed by the gang, throws away his identity to become his brother. This federal agent is soon to become the gang’s boss…!
description.pt-br: Os irmãos gêmeos Baek Yisoo, agente de inteligência da Hid e Baek Dohyeong, chefe de uma organização criminosa, viveram vidas diferentes mesmo com o mesmo rosto. Depois de ser traído pela organização o irmão mais novo decide abandonar sua identidade e se tornar o irmão mais velho. Um agente de inteligência torna-se chefe de uma organização criminosa…!

altTitles.en: Mako-san Will Not Be Independent Even If It Kills Her

altTitles.ja: マコさんは死んでも自立しない

altTitles.zh-hk: 真子小姐她死都不想自立

altTitles.ru: Мако не будет независимой, даже если это убьёт её

description.en: It's been one year since Rin moved to Tokyo for high school. He was told by the landlord of his apartment that he didn't have to pay rent if he takes care of the landlord's granddaughter, which he immediately accepted. However, that granddaughter, Mako, ended up being a 20 year old college student who is completely incapable of taking care of herself. Even so, it was love at first sight for Rin, and he's been taking care of her ever since.

altTitles.en: Lord of the Wheel of Fortune! When changes come to the world

altTitles.zh: 命轮之主！当异变降临人间

altTitles.en: The Lord of the Wheel of Destiny

description.en: A planet called Ghost Star suddenly appeared, causing the earth's animals and plants to evolve into monsters that can destroy humans. At the time of human extinction, people accidentally discovered a way to log into the ghost star, and found that they could gain power against monsters on the ghost star. So in order to survive, human beings started the era of exploring ghost stars...

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

When the threat of the Dungeons looms large in the land of Aria, adventurers rally to explore them in pursuit of fame and fortune. The young alchemist Caldwell is no different, but he faces one huge obstacle: where most everyone is able to cast spells in some form, his pitifully small essence pool means he can't fight using magic like everyone else. He'll need to turn the pacifistic powers of item creation and transmutation into battle techniques in order to survive, and pursue his dream of one day making a name for himself.  
  
Note: Reads Left to Right.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/gelidspace)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/galaxyspark)

South Korea is filled with various shitty laws.
The group of ‘juvenile kids’ that made my life into a living hell didn’t receive any punishment: these kids were the result of these shitty laws. I’ll now start my revenge.
description.kk:
Оңтүстік Корея әртүрлі заңдарға толы.
Менің өмірімді тозаққа айналдырған "жас балалар" тобы ешқандай жазаға тартылмады: бұл балалар осы заңдардың нәтижесі болды. Енді мен кек алуды бастаймын.
description.ko:
대한민국은 X같은 법들로 가득하다
나를 지옥으로 밀어넣고도 처벌받지 않았던 ‘촉법소년’들
그 X같은 법의 결과물들에게, 지금부터 복수를 시작한다
description.es-la: Corea del Sur está llena de leyes de mierda. El grupo de «menores» que convirtió mi vida en un infierno no recibió ningún castigo: esos menores fueron el resultado de esas leyes de mierda. Ahora comenzaré mi venganza. (Ocurre en el mismo universo de Lookism)
description.pt-br:
A Coreia do Sul está cheia de leis de merda.
E os ‘deliquentes’ que me empurraram para o inferno nunca foram punidos.
Então, está na hora de me vingar e passar por cima dessas leis de merda.

title.en: The Villainess Just Wants To Live In Peace!

description.en:
I transmigrated as the villainess of a novel.

I wanted to get rid of my death flag and live in peace, but apparently I’ve already been whipping and tormenting the final villain. I wasn't the one who did it, but since I still felt responsible for it, I’ve been taking care of him, and the villain's loyalty towards me keeps increasing.

I just want to enjoy my wealth and honor in peace.
I don't know why the story keeps going astray!

description.en: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.

altTitles.ja: 桜蘭高校ホスト部

description.en: One day, Haruhi, a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School, breaks an $80,000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club," a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages, she is forced to work for the club, and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]

altTitles.ja: カラーチェンジ

description.en:
Nijimi-san is an ordinary high school girl, except her hair changes color based on her mood. Her classmate has cataloged most of her color changes, but there’s one color which is still a mystery to him…
___

altTitles.ru: История о девушке, которая утверждает, что за сто дней невозможно полюбить другую девушку

description.en:
"It's impossible for two girls to date, after all."  

One day, Marika Sakakibara, a popular high school girl, is suddenly shown a million yen by the cool, beautiful, Aya Fuwa.

"I'll buy you. Ten thousand yen a day for one hundred days. Why don't you try it? See just how 'impossible' it is between two girls."
"…Huh? Huuhhhh?"

So begins their daily afterschool [REDACTED] time.

From gently stroking breasts and holding hands, every day, Fuwa's actions begin to escalate!!

And, after one hundred days, will Marika really still be able to proclaim that "It's impossible!"? (She will not.)
description.ja:
「女同士なんて、ありえないでしょ！」
モテ系JKの榊原鞠佳は、ある日、クラスのクールな美少女・不破絢に突然百万円を突き付けられた。

「一日一万円で百日間、あなたを買うわ。女同士が本当にありえないかどうか、試してあげる。」
「――は？ はぁっ?」

百日間経っても「女同士なんてありえない」という考えが変わらなかったら、鞠佳の勝ちというルールで放課後は絢の言うことを何でも聞くことに。
その日から放課後になると手を握ったり、頭を優しく撫でまわされたり、ついには○○されちゃったり…?

果たして鞠佳は百日経っても「ありえない」と言い張ることができるのか――

Да, я паук, и что с того?

altTitles.th: แมงมุมแล้วไง, ข้องใจเหรอคะ?

altTitles.ja: 蜘蛛ですが、なにか？

altTitles.pt-br: Então eu sou uma aranha, e daí?

altTitles.en: So I'm a Spider, So What?

description.en:
When a mysterious explosion killed an entire class full of high school students, the souls of everyone in class were transported into a fantasy world and reincarnated. While some students were reincarnated as princes or prodigies, others were not as blessed.  
Our heroine, who was the lowest in the class, discovered that she was reincarnated as a spider! Now at the bottom of the food chain, she needs to adapt to the current situation with willpower in order to live. Stuck in a dangerous labyrinth filled with monsters, it's eat or be eaten!  
This is the story of a spider doing whatever she can in order to survive!
description.ru: В результате необъяснимого происшествия с участием пикселей класс обычных японских школьников погибает, но перерождается в другом мире. А нашей героине, которая была самой непопулярной в классе, повезло куда больше. Она переродилась пауком в подземелье, полном опасностей. Сможет ли она, используя лишь свою хитрость и удачу, выжить?
description.pt-br: Quando uma misteriosa explosão mata toda uma classe cheia de alunos do ensino médio, as almas de todos na sala de aula são transportadas para um mundo de fantasia e reencarnados. Enquanto alguns estudantes foram reencarnados como príncipes ou prodígios, outros não foram tão abençoados. Nossa heroína, que era a menor na classe, descobriu que ela estava reencarnado como uma aranha!? Agora, na parte inferior da cadeia alimentar, ela precisa se adaptar à situação atual com a força de vontade para viver! Preso em um labirinto perigoso, repleto de monstros, é comer ou ser comido! Esta é a história de uma aranha fazendo tudo o que puder para sobreviver!

title.en: Buta Kizoku wa Mirai wo Kiri Hiraku you desu

altTitles.ja: 豚貴族は未来を切り開くようです

description.en: The glory of the past is long gone. Once hailed as a prodigy, now mocked as the “Pig Noble” due to his arrogance and appearance, Herbert, the son of a ducal family, falls into despair upon receiving a letter through temporal magic from his future self, revealing a tragic fate twenty years ahead. However, determined to face the self he had long avoided, the “Pig Noble” resolves to struggle and use temporal magic to carve out a different future for himself!

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (?) si Nishikata-san

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (former) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.tl: Si Chi, ang minamahal na anak ng (dating) Takagi at Nishikata. Ngayon ay nasa high school na kasama ang batang lalaki sa tabi, kaya ba n'yang tuksuhin s'ya tulad ng kanyang ina?! O s'ya ba ang matutukso tulad ng kanyang ama!? Ang mga araw na puno ng pang-aasar ay magsisimula na muli— !
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!

altTitles.ja: 転生コロシアム～最弱スキルで最強の女たちを攻略して奴隷ハーレム作ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Coliseum ~Saijaku Skill de Saikyo no Onna-tachi o Koryaku Shite Dorei Harem Tsukurimasu~
Tensei Coliseum ~Saijaku Skill de Saikyo no Onna-tachi wo Koryaku Shite Dorei Harem Tsukurimasu~

altTitles.en: Reincarnation Coliseum ~Using The Weakest Skill To Defeat The Strongest Women And Create A Slave Harem~
Reincarnation Colosseum - Using the Weakest Skills in Order to Defeat the Strongest Women and Create a Slave Harem

altTitles.id: Reinkarnasi Colosseum - Menggunakan Keterampilan Terlemah untuk Mengalahkan Wanita Terkuat dan Membuat Harem Budak

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生競技場～用最弱技能擊敗最強的女人們打造奴隸後宮～

altTitles.es-la: Coliseo de Reencarnación - Utilizar las Habilidades Más Débiles para Atacar a las Mujeres Más Fuertes y Crear un Harén de Esclavas

altTitles.ko: 전생 콜로세움 ～최약 스킬로 최강의 여자들을 공략해 노예 할렘 만듭니다～

altTitles.ja: 転コロ

description.en: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
description.es:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Kouji Mikagami, memiliki nilai pelajaran biasa dan kemampuan atletik biasa, tapi "dia tidak banyak kalah" dalam bermain game, entah kenapa saat bermain game dia tiba-tiba dipanggil ke dunia lain. Sebuah cerita yang dimulai dengan apa yang terjadi. Meskipun mengkonsumsi 1.000 batu ajaib tingkat tinggi untuk melakukan pemanggilan, fakta bahwa ia hanya memiliki "Skill Copy" kemampuan terlemah membuat marah pendeta, dan akhirnya Mikagami dijadikan budak gladiator di Colosseum. Mikagami yang kesal dengan situasi yang tiba-tiba menyadari bahwa situasinya seperti dalam game, dan dengan kemampuan terlemahnya dia akan membuat budak harem di dunia lain.
description.es-la:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.

altTitles.zh-ro: Tā De Shān, Tā De Hǎi

description.en: (Gentle, tenacious honor student and the cold domineering girl) Chi Tang and Youyu are both weirdos in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They become desk mates, roommates, each other's salvation, protecting the other's warmth. The relationship between the two went from ignorance to understanding. A poem of youth composed.
description.zh: （温柔坚韧学霸&骄横高冷少女）池唐和游余都是高一二班被敬而远之的异类，她们成为同桌和室友，也成为救赎、保护彼此的温暖。两人的感情从懵懂到刻骨，谱写一首青春的诗歌。

description.en: Jang Gwangnam's life as he grows the guard tribe that protects the Kana-Shi city.

title.en: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo, Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu

altTitles.ja: 生まれた直後に捨てられたけど、前世が大賢者だったので余裕で生きてます

altTitles.en: Since My Previous Life was a Wise Man, I can Afford to Live.

description.en:
Born to excellent parents, Reus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking!

Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!
description.ja:
見た目は赤ちゃん、だけど中身は大賢者!?

世界を変えた最強の魔法使い・大賢者アリストテレウスがその生涯を閉じた…。
だが大賢者アリストテレウスは、死んだ後に転生の魔道具を使い、転生することに成功したのだった。
転生した先は、何百、何千年経ったのかも分からない後の世界の魔法名門家の赤子。
恵まれた人生を歩むはずが、内に宿した規格外の魔力のせいか勘違いされ、生まれた直後に捨てられてしまう…!?
しかし大賢者の能力と記憶を持つ赤子は、聖竜杖リントヴルムをお供に余裕で生き抜くのだった…!!

description.en: On the first day of school, six students felt their hearts flutter all at the very same moment in time! This is the story of each of them pursuing and being pursued out of their earnest wishes for love.

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

“내 애인인 척 사교계에 들어가.” 
전 세계에서 주목하는 톱스타, 셀리나는 
촬영 중 갑작스러운 사고로 북부 공작의 땅에 차원 이동한다. 
마수에게서 목숨을 구해준 북부 공작, 칼시온은

description.ru:
Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

---

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

掉入异世被迫假扮情侣，可公爵你的演技太差了吧！
在一次拍摄过程中，备受全球瞩目的巨星赛琳娜因突发事故穿越到了北部公爵的领地上。北部公爵卡西温将她从魔兽手中救了下来，并向她提出合约，要求她假装成自己的爱人，进入社交界获取情报……

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Neng Fu Zhi Tian Fu

description.en: The young man Ye Tian obtains the ability to copy the talents of others, and now fights against the heavens to change his fate. He struggles to survive and protect his sister from the apocalypse of the alien beast invasion. In order to become stronger, he begins to explore the unknown world, and gradually reveals the secret behind the invasion of the alien dimensions…
description.pt-br: O jovem Ye Tian ganhou a habilidade de replicar os talentos de outras pessoas, o que mudou seu destino de tempos em tempos. Para proteger sua irmã, ele luta para sobreviver no mundo apocalíptico, quando alienígenas, feras e monstros o invadem. Para se tornar mais forte, ele se aventura a explorar o mundo desconhecido, descobrindo aos poucos os segredos por trás da invasão de diferentes dimensões…

altTitles.ja: 怪物王女

description.en:
Werewolves, demons, monsters, vampires. All these ferocious creatures are afraid of the same thing: the beautiful Princess Hime, an awesome warrior who fights off the forces of evil with a chainsaw and a smile. Not only does she look great in a tiara, she has power that allows her to raise the dead. She's a girl on a mission, and with the help of her undead servant and a supercute robot, there's no creature of darkness she can't take down!

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/232-princess-resurrection?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/princess-resurrection)

Veteran Jayden is suffering from severe PTSD after losing his crush Matthew, during their deployment in the war a few years ago.

He has been trying hard to return to his everyday life but the pain isn't getting any better. One day, he decides to give up on everything and leaves for a trip without a plan...

When Jayden reaches his unplanned destination, he happens to meet Diego, a man who looks remarkably similar to Matthew, and his attraction to him begins to grow...

Novice lyricist Baek Jiseok enters A&R Co. through a recommendation from his college senior and is assigned to compose the lyrics of a new song for renowned singer Cha Doyoon. However, his lyrics are stolen, and he finds himself on the brink of a lawsuit. 
The person who extends a helping hand in this situation to the desperate Jiseok is none other than Cha Doyoon?!
"Why are you helping me?"
Will Jiseok be able to pen his lyrics successfully even as he cohabitates with the unfathomable Doyoon?

title.en: Biryuu Enshoutan ~Jikokouteikan ga Gekitei na Dragon-kyuu Bishoujo Maou o, Yuusha ga Icharabu de Taijisuru Ohanashi~

altTitles.ja: 美龍艶笑譚～自己肯定感が激低なドラゴン級美少女魔王を、勇者がイチャラブで退治するお話～

altTitles.en: A Story About a Hero Exterminating a Dragon-Class Beautiful Girl Demon Queen, Who Has Very Low Self-Esteem, With Love!

description.en:
Iver is a dragon maou who stopped trying after historical heroes defeated her every time she resurrected. But the present day hero, Mirio, who found the holy sword by pure chance falls in love with her. And thus forms the couple of the maou with no self-esteem and the dopey hero. This is a story of how they come to know each other, fight, and find happiness.

---

description.id:
Iver adalah maou naga yang berhenti mencoba setelah pahlawan sejarah mengalahkannya setiap kali dia dibangkitkan. Tapi pahlawan masa kini, Mirio, yang menemukan pedang suci secara kebetulan jatuh cinta padanya. Dan dengan demikian membentuk pasangan maou tanpa harga diri dan pahlawan tolol. Ini adalah kisah tentang bagaimana mereka saling mengenal, bertarung, dan menemukan kebahagiaan.

Berdasarkan novel hentai.
description.ja:
何度復活しても歴代勇者に敗北し、心が折れてしまった龍魔族の魔王・イヴェール。伝説の聖剣を偶然手にした当代の新米勇者・ミリオは、そんな彼女に恋をしてしまった！　しかして自信喪失中の魔王＆天然勇者のコンビ結成！　二人は身体を重ね、冒険の旅に出る！

魔王の失われた笑顔を取り戻せ！ 新米勇者が綱渡りの大奮闘！ 異世界シリアスコメディ幕開け！

description.en:
"Did I take away their lover?"

Seo Ino, an average man from South Korea, wakes up after losing consciousness to find himself in a strange place. He soon comes to the realization that he is inside the body of Cassius, the Vice Captain of the Royal Knights. The only person he can rely on is Cassius's fellow knight and former lover, Alberto Noe, who has always protected Cassius. But knowing that Alberto is all he has now, Cassius (Ino) makes a vow to protect him instead.

title.en: Misato-san wa Amasugi Joushi ni Chotto Kibishii

altTitles.ja: 三郷さんは甘すぎ上司にちょっとキビしい

altTitles.en: Misato-san is a Bit Cold Towards Her Boss Who Pampers

description.en:
Misato-san, a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job, and her boss—Konishikawa-san, a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san, but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL)

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw](https://shukanmanga.jp/work_list/detail/misatosan)
description.ja: 仕事ができて超美人OLの三郷さんと、部下に甘いおじさん上司の小西川さん。三郷さんは小西川さんに対して厳しい態度で接するが、そこに隠された想いとは…！？ 厳しさと可愛さのギャップに悶絶する、年の差オフィスラブコメディー開幕！！

description.en:
One day, a 'Gate' suddenly opened on Earth, and through that Gate came pouring out monsters from the dungeon. To combat that, humans awakened special abilities. ...And here is a  S-grade ability user who is depressed over not being able to date anyone because of his awakened ability. That person is Ashe, a Paladin who literally wields a lightsaber, for he possesses a ginormous glowing penis. 

On a certain day, Ashe was clearing out a dungeon as usual when an ability user named Roose, who posseses the ability of 'Nullification' appears before him, and starts playing with him. In that instant, Ashe instinctively feels it - 'This person is the only one who can handle my XXX!!'

Can Ashe obtain Roose's heart?!

A full-blown erotic comedy between a Hero and a Villain!

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

altTitles.en: I Will Politely Decline the Male Lead!

altTitles.mn: Би эелдэгээр эрэгтэй гол дүрээс татгалзах болно!

altTitles.ja: 男主人公は丁重にお断りします！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我會禮貌地拒絕男主角

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---

description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---

description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

title.en: I Became a Childhood Friend of a Mid-Level Boss

altTitles.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Middle Boss

description.en:
Do Kyunwoo is the black sheep of his renowned swordsman family. He cannot even catch a rabbit on his own. On his first day of fifth grade, he meets a tranfer student and recalls his past life.

He had reincarnated into the world of a game he used to play called [Brave Hearts]. He was already frustrated that he had reincarnated as a loser, but on top of that, the transfer student is an intermediate/mid-tier boss who will destroy the world!

“Why are you being so nice to me?”

“Because I want to be friends with you.”

Do Kyunwoo’s plan is to become friends with the transfer student in order to prevent the end of the world!

In order to survive in this new world and to reach an ending he desires. He becomes best friends with the mid level boss.

title.en: Traveling Through Time and Space to Become an Unlucky NPC: I Have a Wife to Protect Me

altTitles.zh: 穿越成倒霉NPC: 我有老婆罩着

description.en: He Qingyang traveled to the game "Sword Immortal Legend" he was playing and became an unlucky NPC who kept skipping the plot when he was playing the game. This NPC kept harassing the main heroine Ning Yiwan, and later his identity was exposed and he was killed by Ning Yiwan.....

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生
野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

altTitles.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

altTitles.ja: 幻想侵攻

description.en:
A mysterious man named "Ryo" who has lost his memory wakes up in a different world populated by monster girls (fantasy species) that easily surpass the power of humans. He possesses a certain power, the skill of "charm", which forces him to increase the likability of all monster girls!
Despite his distress, Ryo uses his power to seduce all kinds of monster girls and build a harem. All in order to achieve a certain goal...!

Eros and carnage intersect in this otherworldly adventure tale that opens at!
description.ja:
人間の力を軽く凌駕するモンスター娘（幻想種）が跋扈する異世界で目覚めた、記憶を失った謎の男「リョウ」。そんな彼にはある力、モンスター娘たちすべての好感度を強制的に上げる「魅了」のスキルを所持していた!!
苦悩しつつもリョウは己の力を使いあらゆるモンスター娘を篭絡し、ハーレムを築く。すべてはある目的を遂行するため…!!!

**エロスと殺戮が交差する、エロティック異世界冒険譚 開幕――!!!!!!**
description.pt-br:
Um homem misterioso, conhecido como *"Ryou"*, que perdeu suas memórias, acorda em um mundo paralelo populado por mulheres monstro que possuem poderes que ultrapassam qualquer limite humano. No entanto, esse mesmo homem possui um poder, a habilidade conhecida como *"Charme"*, que lhe permite interferir na psique dessas *"criaturas fantásticas"*!
Apesar do contínuo sentimento de *"inquietação"*, Ryou usará sua habilidade para seduzir todo tipo de criatura fantástica, assim criando um harém, tudo para que seja possível alcançar um certo objetivo...

**Gore e erotismo se cruzam nesta aventura em um mundo paralelo!**

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: 弟の友達

description.en:
Ga-eun is a junior in college who lives with her younger brother, a senior in high school. Ever since their parents' death, she has tried to stay strong and confident amidst juggling school and raising her brother. And after getting dumped by her boyfriend, dating is the last thing on her mind... until she gets involved with three of her brother’s friends. Which one will she choose? The cheeky, handsome childhood friend Dowan? The calm, collected, and responsible class president Sangu? Or the quiet and intimidating but kind-hearted Jun?

---

description.id:
Gaeun, mahasiswi yang sedang tinggal bersama adiknya setelah orang tuanya meninggal. Setelah putus dengan pacarnya, Ia memutuskan untuk tidak akan berpacaran lagi. Tapi semuanya berubah setelah ia bertemu teman-teman adiknya! Akhirnya Gaeun pun menikah dengan salah satu teman adiknya. Pertanyaannya adalah, siapakah calon suaminya...?!

description.ja:
高校生の弟と二人で暮らす大学生の加奈。彼氏に振られもう恋愛はしないと思っていたが、突然弟の友達である男子高生3人と奇妙な関係に…！ 数年後、加奈と結婚したのは果たして―⁉

description.ko:
사고로 부모님이 돌아가신 후 고등학생인 남동생과 둘이 살고 있는 대학교 3학년 가은.
아픔을 겉으로 티내지 않고 밝고 자신감 있게 살고 있다고 본인은 생각 중이다.
딱 자기 취향이었던 남자 친구에게 차인 후 더 이상 연애를 하지 않겠다고 생각했지만,
어릴 때부터 알고 지내던 아는 동생 도완, 동생의 반 반장 상우,알바 중인 미술학원 수강생 준과 엮이며
별안간 연하남들의과 미묘한 분위기가 된다.
동생 친구와 결혼하기로 했다며 친구들에게 청첩장을 건네는 가은. 과연 셋 중 누구와 결혼하게 될까...?

---

description.zh:
最甜不过姐弟恋！
当三个弟弟同时追求我！
父母意外去世后，读大三的嘉恩独自带着弟弟生活。在被男友甩后，嘉恩认为自己再也无法得到爱了。然而渐渐地，嘉恩发现自己开始被奇妙的姻缘围绕——从小一起长大，亲弟弟般的斗焕、弟弟的班长尚宇、美术生小俊。多年后，朋友们收到了嘉恩的婚礼请柬，听说新郎是年下男? 到底新郎是他们中哪一个呢?

---

description.zh-hk:
大三的佳恩自從父母意外過世後，便和高中生弟弟相依為命。正當佳恩認為自己沒有表露傷痛，活得開朗又有自信時，慘遭天菜男友狠甩。佳恩本來決定不再談戀愛，可是認識多年的鄰家弟弟道宛、親弟弟班上的班長尚宇、在她打工的美術補習班上課的隼走進了她的生活，和這些弟弟相處的氣氛也逐漸微妙。後來，佳恩決定和弟弟的朋友結婚，並向朋友遞出喜帖。究竟在三人當中，誰才是她的新郎…？

---
